member.name: EMRGLSRECORD
member.summary: The EMRGLSRECORD structure contains members for an enhanced metafile record generated by OpenGL functions. It contains data for OpenGL functions that scale automatically to the OpenGL viewport.

member.name: EMRGLSRECORD.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all records.

member.name: EMRGLSRECORD.Data
member.summary: Array of data representing the OpenGL function to be performed.
